features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新主要针对系统进行了优化，推荐您进行更新
• 新增支持更多横屏应用进入横屏悬浮窗
• 优化 Mini 窗交互体验，拖拽 Mini 窗边角，可切换为悬浮窗与全屏
• 新增状态栏图标自定义功能，可自由选择需要显示的状态栏图标。体验路径：设置 > 通知和状态栏 > 状态栏
• 新增通知中心/控制中心背景动态模糊效果
• 新增充电提示音开关功能。体验路径：设置 > 声音 > 更多声音设置 > 充电提示音
• 新增一句话投屏功能，您可以对 YOYO 说："把平板投屏到电视上"等类似指令，即可体验 (YOYO 智能体需要在应用市场升级到 90.10.22.031 版本及以上)
• 分享动态照片时，在荣耀分享界面新增动态照片角标，方便识别分享的照片类型
• 新增支持响铃/取消响铃设置快捷入口。体验路径：设置 > 辅助功能 > 快捷启动及手势 > 双击电源键/熄屏下双击音量下键 > 响铃/取消响铃
• 新增 WLAN 断开连接、密码显示功能。体验路径：设置 > WLAN > 点击已连接的 WLAN，可断开 WLAN 或者查看密码
• 优化部分场景使用卡顿问题，提升整机流畅性
• 修复部分场景下三方应用闪退问题
• 提升系统稳定性，让您的平板运行更稳定
• 合入安卓 2025 年 11 月安全补丁，增强系统安全性。有关荣耀软件安全更新内容的信息，请访问荣耀官方网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/support/bulletin/2025/11
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持
Dear user, this update mainly enhances the system performance. Update to enjoy the improvements
• More landscape-oriented apps can now be switched to floating windows while in use
• Optimizes the mini window interaction. You can drag its corners to switch the mini window into a floating window or full screen
• Status bar enables icon customization, allowing you to choose which status bar icons to display. Try it out by going to: Settings > Notifications & status bar > Status bar
• The Notification center and Control Center include background motion blur effects
• Charging alert sound can be turned on or off as needed. Try it out by going to: Settings > Sound > More sound settings > Charging alert sound
• To easily mirror your tablet screen to the TV, just say a command like "Cast my tablet screen to the TV." (Make sure YOYO Agent is updated to version 90.10.22.031 or above from the App Market)
• When sharing moving photos, you can see a moving photo badge on the Honor Share interface, making it easier to identify the type of photo being shared

• Use shortcuts to quickly turn the ringtone on or off. Try it out by going to: Settings > Accessibility features > Shortcuts & gestures > Double press power button/Double press volume down button with the screen off > Turn on/off ringtone
• Supports disconnecting from WLAN and viewing the password. Go to Settings > WLAN, tap the connected WLAN, then you can disconnect it or view the password
• Resolves the occasional stuttering issues to enhance the overall smoothness of the device
• Fixes the issues causing third-party apps to crash in some scenarios
• Improves the system stability to make your tablet run more stably

• Android security patch (Nov 2025) has been incorporated for system security. For more information about Honor Security updates, please visit our website https://www.honor.com/global/support/bulletin/2025/11

1. Installing this update will not affect your personal data, but it is still recommended to back up your data before updating 2. Discover more information on product features in Tips 3. If you encounter any issue during use, please get support by going to My Honor or visiting our website: https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us
